content: > with this crochet pattern you can make yourself a tiny little robin only about 3 cm/1 5 tall simple and quick to make with minimal sewing he s perfect to hang on your tree or decorate anywhere else you like **you will need ** small amounts of red brown and white yarn double knitting or worsted weight small amount of black yarn for the eyes and beak a length of cotton yarn to hang as a decoration small amount of stuffing 3 5mm e hook tapestry needle
